Message.Title: A technical view supports more upside
Message.Msg: The buy rating for DELL at 9trading website is set to 7 with the 12.13 target price in short term.
Just keep an eye out for end of year sell off for taxes. Dell is down big this year,
Confused on what you mean by this, though I think I have the idea: they sell off to claim a loss (maybe with an option handcuff). Is that what you're saying?

Yes. The stock has taken a beating this year. If you have been holding long at a higher price you would sell within the next 30 days to lock in the loss for tax purposes. Then you can buy it back to ride it up.

Message.Title: Go Dell, Go..I want to short you at the end of the day!
Message.Msg: Easy trade, up nearly 1.00 in the last 3 days with S&P resistance at 1400...quick hit for tomorrow. GLTA

Good Afternoon Longs. Dell inc. doing fine today, breaking MA50 on daily graphs without much resistance, bottom pattern in progress. We could see much more upward momentum with crossing MA (20/50) at the end of the week. Going Long starts to be a profitable business in this undervalued company. P/E 5 c´mon... Have a nice day Longs.

Message.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell
Message.Msg: I ordered about 3K worth of stuff and discover card put hold on it for unusual transaction.They removed hold after I talked to them. Dell telephoned me with a automation call to read email about the hold. So please take the following steps: - Call your card issuer today (their phone number will be on the back of your credit card) and tell them about your Dell order - We will attempt to process your order again on the next working day However if you’d like to use a different card or payment method to complete your order - please click below to chat with a Dell agent (agents available from 9am to 6pm Monday to Friday CST) After about 15 mins I talked to someone and he transferred me (about 35 mins) to another who said I need to be transferred to someone else (I protested) he said he could not help and after another half hour on hold I gave I up and hung up! This is a horrible way to treat someone that wants to make a big purchase. I am disgusted and Dell lost a lifetime customer that upgrades to the best and often. Tomorrow I will go to the apple store!

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: At Apple you are guaranteed to get the same treatment, and will have to pay about 3 times as much for the same functionality.

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: Dell got my telephone number. I am gonna look at Apple products at their store if Dell dont call soon! It is really hard to believe that Dell refuses to have someone available to fulfill my order!

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: Have you tried the Website? It is actually quite easy to order. I recommend the Optiplex line in small business, as those have a standard 3 year warranty. I buy and recommend Dell to all my Healthcare clientele.Out of 45+ Pcs I had one go bad after two years on one order.A Dell Tech came in to replace the Motherboard the next day. Good Quality and great support at a decent price!
